mapper.sql: C.DEPT_KD as dept_kd, C.DIVISI_KD as divisi_kd, C.SUBDIV_KD as subdiv_kd, C.DEPT_NM as dept_nm, C.SYS_USER_UPDATE as user_update, C.SYS_TGL_UPDATE as tgl_update, C.SYS_JAM_UPDATE as jam_update, C.SYS_USER_CREATE as user_create, C.SYS_TGL_CREATE as tgl_create
